mapper.select: SELECT sr.*, rj.job_cate_id, jc.category_name, we.id AS workExperienceId, we.work_title, we.work_content FROM stu_resume_info sr LEFT JOIN resume_job rj ON sr.id = rj.resu_id LEFT JOIN job_category jc ON rj.job_cate_id = jc.id LEFT JOIN work_experience we ON sr.id = we.resu_id WHERE sr.stu_id =#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND sr.`status` != 2

SELECT sr.*, rj.job_cate_id, jc.category_name, we.id AS workExperienceId, we.work_title, we.work_content FROM stu_resume_info sr LEFT JOIN resume_job rj ON sr.id = rj.resu_id LEFT JOIN job_category jc ON rj.job_cate_id = jc.id LEFT JOIN work_experience we ON sr.id = we.resu_id WHERE sr.id =#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
